COMMAND.name: quit
COMMAND.help: Quit this CLI session

COMMAND.name: top
COMMAND.help: Go back to the main CLI level

COMMAND.name: up
COMMAND.help: Go back to the previous CLI menu level

COMMAND.name: ap
COMMAND.help: Mesh Access Point decribes general configuration

COMMAND.name: security
COMMAND.help: Mesh Access Point Security describes security parameters

COMMAND.name: ap show
COMMAND.help: Show information

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex
PARAM.help: AccessPointIndex parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*) - by default

COMMAND.name: ap update
COMMAND.help: Update management objects information of the appropriated component

COMMAND.name: ap config
COMMAND.help: Configure parameters of the object

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex
PARAM.help: Index parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*)

COMMAND.ACTION: cliParams="" if [ ${SSID} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"SSID = '${SSID}',";fi if [ ${MultiApMode} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"MultiApMode = '${MultiApMode}',";fi if [ ${Band2_4G} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band2_4G = '${Band2_4G}',";fi if [ ${Band5GL} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GL = '${Band5GL}',";fi if [ ${Band5GH} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GH = '${Band5GH}',";fi if [ ${Band6G} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band6G = '${Band6G}',";fi cliParams=$(echo $cliParams | sed 's/,$//') if [ -z "$cliParams" ]; then cliParams = "null" echo "No parameter is specified for set operation" else /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.Controller.Network.AccessPoint.${AccessPointIndex}. sectionId=prpl_ap_1 type=set cliParamsStr="$cliParams" fi

COMMAND.name: ap add
COMMAND.help: Add a new instance of the object
COMMAND.ACTION: cliParams="" if [ ${SSID} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"SSID = '${SSID}',";fi if [ ${MultiApMode} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"MultiApMode = '${MultiApMode}',";fi if [ ${Band2_4G} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band2_4G = '${Band2_4G}',";fi if [ ${Band5GL} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GL = '${Band5GL}',";fi if [ ${Band5GH} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GH = '${Band5GH}',";fi if [ ${Band6G} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band6G = '${Band6G}',";fi cliParams=$(echo $cliParams | sed 's/,$//') if [ -z "$cliParams" ]; then /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.Controller.Network.AccessPoint. sectionId=prpl_ap_1 type=add else /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.Controller.Network.AccessPoint. sectionId=prpl_ap_1 type=add cliParamsStr="$cliParams" fi

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex

COMMAND.ACTION: cliParams="" if [ ${ModeEnabled} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"ModeEnabled = '${ModeEnabled}',";fi if [ ${PreSharedKey} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"PreSharedKey = '${PreSharedKey}',";fi if [ ${KeyPassphrase} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"KeyPassphrase = '${KeyPassphrase}',";fi if [ ${SAEPassphrase} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"SAEPassphrase = '${SAEPassphrase}',";fi cliParams=$(echo $cliParams | sed 's/,$//') if [ -z "$cliParams" ]; then cliParams = "null" echo "No parameter is specified for set operation" else /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.Controller.Network.AccessPoint.${AccessPointIndex}.Security. sectionId=prpl_ap_2 type=set cliParamsStr="$cliParams" fi
